name: Halloween Dentist - Horror And Scary
description:
***ATTENTION!!! SOME MONSTERS NEED A DENTIST***

Yes! Halloween Monsters needs to go to the Dentist too! Help them ALL get shiny sparkling teeth so they can show off their sharp teeth and scare everyone!

The Fun Includes:

* Tooth Decay! Yank those ugly teeth!
* Bad Breath! Pew! Spray away the bad breath!
* Shine up their teeth with a toothbrush!
* CRAZY Tools to get rid of cavities!
* Add some sparkling GRILLZ!

GET it TODAY !!!!
